H0.text: What spirit, in Ireland and Scotland, makes noises near a house when someone is about to die. Bean Nighe

H1.text: What spirit, in Ireland and Scotland, makes noises near a house when someone is about to die. Cù Sìth

H2.text: What spirit, in Ireland and Scotland, makes noises near a house when someone is about to die. Ghillie Dhu

H3.text: What spirit, in Ireland and Scotland, makes noises near a house when someone is about to die. Banshee

A4.text: The banshee is a female spirit in Irish folklore who heralds the death of a family member, usually by screaming, wailing, shrieking, or keening.

A5.text: The banshee is also a predictor of death. If someone is about to enter a situation where it is unlikely they will come out alive she will warn people by screaming or wailing.
